Identification.ShortTitle: Access to Information Act Extension Order, No. 1
Identification.LongTitle: Order Extending the Right To Be Given Access under Subsection 4(1) of the Access to Information Act to Records under the Control of a Government Institution

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, pursuant to subsection 4(2) of the Access to Information Act, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Order extending the right to be given access under subsection 4(1) of the Access to Information Act to records under the control of a government institution.

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Access to Information Act Extension Order, No. 1.

The right to be given access under subsection 4(1) of the Access to Information Act to records under the control of a government institution is hereby extended to include all individuals who are present in Canada but who are not Canadian citizens or permanent residents within the meaning of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and all corporations that are present in Canada.
